card.name: Dr. Doom - Mastermind
card.text: Always Leads: Doombot Legion. Master Strike: Each player with exactly 6 cards in hand reveals a [Tech] Hero or puts 2 cards from their hand on top of their deck.

card.name: Dark Technology - Mastermind Tactic Dr. Doom
card.text: You may recruit a [Tech] or [Range] Hero from the HQ for free.

card.name: Monarch's Decree - Mastermind Tactic Dr. Doom
card.text: Fight: Choose one: each other player draws a card or each other player discards a card.

card.name: Secrets of Time Travel - Mastermind Tactic Dr. Doom
card.text: Fight: Take another turn after this one.

card.name: Treasures of Latveria - Mastermind Tactic Dr. Doom
card.text: When you draw a new hand of cards at the end of this turn, draw three extra cards.

card.name: Loki - Mastermind

card.name: Whispers and Lies - Mastermind Tactic Loki

card.text: Fight: Recruit an [X-Men] from the HQ for free.

card.name: Crushing Shockwave - Mastermind Tactic Magneto

card.name: Electromagnetic Bubble - Mastermind Tactic Magneto
card.text: Fight: Choose one of your [X-Men] Heroes. When you draw a new hand of cards at the end of this turn, add that Hero to your hand as a seventh card.

card.name: Xavier's Nemesis - Mastermind Tactic Magneto
card.text: Fight: For each of your [X-Men] Heroes, rescue a Bystander.

card.name: Red Skull - Mastermind

card.name: Endless Resources - Mastermind Tactic Red Skull
card.text: Fight: You get +4 [Recruit].

card.name: Hydra Conspiracy - Mastermind Tactic Red Skull
card.text: Fight: Draw two cards. Then draw another card for each HYDRA Villain in your Victory Pile.

card.name: Negablast Grenades - Mastermind Tactic Red Skull
card.text: Fight: You get +3 [Attack].

card.name: Ruthless Dictator - Mastermind Tactic Red Skull
card.text: Fight: Look at the top three cards of your deck. KO one, discard one and put one back on top of your deck.

card.name: Midtown Bank Robbery
card.text: Setup: 8 Twists. 12 Bystanders in the Villain Deck. Special Rules: Each Villain gets +1 [Power] for each Bystander it has. Twist: Any Villain in the Bank captures 2 Bystanders. Then play the top card of the Villain Deck. Evil Wins: When 8 Bystanders are carried away by escaping Villains.

card.name: Portals To The Dark Dimension
card.text: Setup: 7 Twists. Each Twist is a Dark Portal. Twist 1: Put the Dark Portal above the Mastermind. The Mastermind gets +1 [Power]. Twist 2-6: Put the Dark Portal in the leftmost city space that doesn't yet have a Dark Portal. Villains in that city space get +1 [Power]. Twist 7: Evil Wins!

card.name: Negative Zone Prison Breakout
card.text: Setup: 8 Twists. Add an extra Henchman group to the Villain Deck. Twist: Play the top 2 cards of the Villain Deck. Evil Wins: If 12 Villains escape.

card.name: Replace Earth's Leaders With Killbots
card.text: Setup: 5 Twists. 3 addtional Twists next to this Scheme. 18 total Bystanders in the Villain Deck. Special Rules: Bystanders in the Villain Deck count as Killbot Villains, with [Power] equal to the number of Twists next to this Scheme. Twist: Put the Twist next to this Scheme. Evil Wins: If 5 "Killbots" escape.

card.name: Super Hero Civil War
card.text: Setup: For 2-3 players, use 8 Twists. For 4-5 players, use 5 Twists. If only 2 players, use only 4 Heroes in the Hero Deck. Twist: KO all the Heroes in the HQ. Evil Wins: If the Hero Deck runs out.

card.name: Secret Invasion Of The Skrull Shapeshifters
card.text: Setup: 8 Twists, 6 Heroes. Skrull Villain Group required. Shuffle 12 random Heroes from the Hero Deck into the Villain Deck. Special Rules: Heroes in the Villain Deck count as Skrull Villains with [Attack] equal to the Heroe's [Cost]+2. If you defeat that Hero, you gain it. Twist: The highest cost Hero from the HQ moves into the Sewers as a Skrull Villain, as above. Evil Wins: If 6 Heroes get into the Escaped Villains pile.

card.name: The Legacy Virus
card.text: Setup: 8 Twists. Wound stack holds 6 Wounds per player. Twist: Each player reveals a [Tech] Heroe or gains a Wound. Evil Wins: If the Wound stack runs out.

card.name: Unleash The Power Of The Cosmic Cube
card.text: Setup: 8 Twists. Twist: Put the Twist next to this Scheme. Twists 5-6: Each player gains a Wound. Twists 7: Each player gains 3 Wounds. Twists 8: Evil Winds!
